header.title: Wortopia
signup.title: Sign up for Wortopia
signup.username.label: Username (no spaces allowed)
signup.username.error.too_short: Username is too short, please use at least 4 characters
signup.username.error.too_long: Username is too long, please use at most 15 characters
signup.username.error.invalid: Username is invalid, please use only a-z, 0-9 and "_" "-"

signup.username.error.already_exists: Username already exists. Please choose another one

login.username.label: Username
login.password.label: Password
recover.title: Forgot password or username
recover.explanation: Just enter your email address and we'll send you an email with a recovery link:
recover.success: Your recovery link has been sent. Please check your inbox and spam folder.
recover.error.invalid_email: Email address is incorrect or is not used.
recover.error.unknown: An unknown error has occured. Please contact mail@wortopia.de
recover.email.label: Email
account.title: Your Account

options.contrastNote: This is an experiment on my part. Should you suffer from probelems with your sight I would be most greatful for some feedback on this. Please contact mail@wortopia.de
messages.browserUpdate: Maybe you should look into updating your browser.
messages.highLatency: A problem with your internet connection or browser has stopped Wortopia from establishing a websocket connection. This means your game will lag a few seconds behind the rest and the timer might not be correct.
